H0.text: when did canada get rid of the death penalty. 1962

H1.text: when did canada get rid of the death penalty. 1976

H2.text: when did canada get rid of the death penalty. 1958

H3.text: when did canada get rid of the death penalty. 1998

A4.text: The death penalty was ended in practice in Canada in 1963.

A5.text: Bill C-84 was passed in 1976, abolishing the death penalty for murder, treason, and piracy.
